item.title: Will Smith To Play Cocaine Dealer Chef?
item.description:
Will Smith is in negotiations for another gritty real-life role - as a convicted drug dealer who turns his life around to become a top chef.

item.title: Cyclone death probe begins
item.description:
A TEAM of police flew to Port Hedland today to begin investigating the deaths of two workers at Fortescue Metals Group's railway camp during Cyclone George.
Comment

item.description:

item.title: Security questions shelve Busta Rhymes from NYC movie set
item.description:

item.title: Charlottetown takes another step Aerosmith's way
item.description:
Charlottetown city council voted Monday night to pay for police and fire services for a major concert this summer, although there is no band confirmed and no price tag attached to those services.
Comment
